title: Adaptive Machine Learning Design for Robotic Emotion Recognition

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Machine Learning Concepts, Understanding of Support Vector Machines (SVM), and Python Programming Experience
context.additional_context: Hybrid learning environment using digital devices (tablets/laptops) to improve workplace efficiency and human-robot interaction skills for professionals

learning_goals: Understand the principle of SVM hyperplane adjustment and apply it to new facial expression data.
Conduct a project to improve classification models by over 15% using Support Vector Pursuit Learning (SVPL).
Cultivate the ability to design adaptive systems through Gaussian kernel space mapping and error sample retraining.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
